organisms1.map: function(doc) { var regexp = new RegExp("^[ACGT]{3}[A][ACGT]{19}$"); if (regexp.test(doc["_id"])){ for (var org in doc) { if (org.charAt(0) != "_") { var nb_occurences = 0; for (var seq_ref in doc[org]){ nb_occurences = nb_occurences + doc } emit(org, nb_occurences)}}}}
